scripts.bootstrap: npm install --prefix apps/api && npm install --prefix apps/web
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix apps/api" "npm run dev --prefix apps/web"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix apps/api && npm run build --prefix apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix apps/api && npm run lint --prefix apps/web
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix apps/api && npm run test --prefix apps/web
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix apps/api && npm run format --prefix apps/web
